attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0018
Problem:    When using ":sleep" channel input is not handled.
Solution:   When there is a channel check for input also when not in raw mode.
            Check every 100 msec.

patch 8.0.0018
Problem:    When using ":sleep" channel input is not handled.
Solution:   When there is a channel check for input also when not in raw mode.
            Check every 100 msec.
